zone.Region Class Reference

A Region is a specific portion of terrain within a given Zone. More...

Public Member Functions

 name
 The name of the Region, for lookup in the data files.
 frequency
 How likely this Region is to occur within the Zone, and thus, how much of the Zone will be composed of this Region relative to other Regions.

Detailed Description

A Region is a specific portion of terrain within a given Zone.

Each sector of the map is part of a single Region.

Member Data Documentation

zone.Region.frequency

How likely this Region is to occur within the Zone, and thus, how much of the Zone will be composed of this Region relative to other Regions.

zone.Region.name

The name of the Region, for lookup in the data files.
